data.actual_result: It attempts to send the message and you get an incorrect error from Clyde.
data.expected_result: You are unable to click invite.
data.short_description: When using the game invite modal you can send invites to channels where you don't have send message permissions.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open a game that supports inviting through the overlay (I used King of the Hat) - Click on the button in the game to open the invite modal in the overlay - Type a channel in which you don't have send messages permissions.
